Journal

  1. Oliver Amft, Florian Wahl, Shoya Ishimaru and Kai Kunze. Making Regular Eyeglasses Smart. Pervasive Computing, IEEE, vol. 14, no. 3, pp. 32–43, 2015.

International Conference

  1. Shoya Ishimaru and Koichi Kise. Quantifying the Mental State on the Basis of Physical and Social Activities. Proceedings of the 2015 ACM International Joint Conference on Pervasive and Ubiquitous Computing Adjunct Publication (UbiComp2015). September 2015.

  2. Kai Kunze, Ömer Sacakli, Shoya Ishimaru, Andreas Dengel, Marcus Liwicki, Koichi Kise and Masahiko Inami. Quantifying Reading Habits – Counting How Many Words You Read. Proceedings of the 2015 ACM International Joint Conference on Pervasive and Ubiquitous Computing Publication (UbiComp2015). September 2015.

  3. Kai Kunze, Yuji Uema, Katsuma Tanaka, Shoya Ishimaru, Koichi Kise and Masahiko Inami MEME – Eye Wear Computing to Explore Human Behavior. Proceedings of the 2015 ACM International Joint Conference on Pervasive and Ubiquitous Computing Adjunct Publication (UbiComp2015). September 2015.

  4. Kai Kunze, Kazutaka Inoue, Katsutoshi Masai, Yuji Uema, Sean Shao-An Tsai, Shoya Ishimaru, Katsuma Tanaka, Koichi Kise and Masahiko Inami. MEME - Smart Glasses to Promote Healthy Habits for Knowledge Workers. Proceedings of ACM SIGGRAPH 2015 Emerging Technologies. August 2015.

  5. Kai Kunze, Katsuma Tanaka, Shoya Ishimaru, Koichi Kise and Masahiko Inami Nekoze! – Monitoring and Detecting Head Posture while Working with Laptop and Mobile Phone. Proceedings of the 9th International Conference on Pervasive Computing Technologies for Healthcare (PervasiveHealth2015). May 2015.

  6. Shoya Ishimaru, Kai Kunze, Katsuma Tanaka, Yuji Uema, Koichi Kise and Masahiko Inami. Smart Eyewear for Interaction and Activity Recognition. Proceedings of the 33rd Annual ACM Conference Extended Abstracts on Human Factors in Computing Systems (CHI2015). April 2015.

  7. Shoya Ishimaru, Kai Kunze, Koichi Kise and Masahiko Inami. Position Paper: Brain Teasers - Toward Wearable Computing that Engages Our Mind. Proceedings of the 2014 ACM International Joint Conference on Pervasive and Ubiquitous Computing Adjunct Publication (UbiComp2014). September 2014.

  8. Shoya Ishimaru, Kai Kunze, Katsuma Tanaka, Yuji Uema, Koichi Kise and Masahiko Inami. Smarter Eyewear – Using Commercial EOG Glasses for Activity Recognition. Proceedings of the 2014 ACM International Joint Conference on Pervasive and Ubiquitous Computing Adjunct Publication (UbiComp2014). September 2014.

  9. Jens Weppner, Andreas Poxrucker, Paul Lukowicz, Shoya Ishimaru, Kai Kunze and Koichi Kise. Shiny - An Activity Logging Platform for Google Glass. Proceedings of the 2014 ACM International Joint Conference on Pervasive and Ubiquitous Computing Adjunct Publication (UbiComp2014). September 2014.

  10. Shoya Ishimaru, Jens Weppner, Kai Kunze, Andreas Bulling, Koichi Kise, Andreas Dengel and Paul Lukowicz. In the Blink of an Eye - Combining Head Motion and Eye Blink Frequency for Activity Recognition with Google Glass. Proceedings of the 5th Augmented Human International Conference (AH2014). March 2014.

  11. Shoya Ishimaru, Kai Kunze, Yuzuko Utsumi, Masakazu Iwamura and Koichi Kise. Where Are You Looking At? - Feature-Based Eye Tracking on Unmodified Tablets. Proceedings of the 2013 2nd IAPR Asian Conference on Pattern Recognition (ACPR2013). November 2013.

  12. Kai Kunze, Shoya Ishimaru, Yuzuko Utsumi and Koichi Kise. My reading life: towards utilizing eyetracking on unmodified tablets and phones. Proceedings of the 2013 ACM Conference on Pervasive and Ubiquitous Computing Adjunct Publication (UbiComp2013). September 2013.

  13. Kai Kunze, Yuki Shiga, Shoya Ishimaru and Koichi Kise. Reading Activity Recognition Using an Off-the-Shelf EEG‒Detecting Reading Activities and Distinguishing Genres of Documents. Proceedings of the 2013 12th International Conference on Document Analysis and Recognition (ICDAR2013). August 2013.

  2. Shoya Ishimaru, Kai Kunze, Koichi Kise, Yuji Uema and Masahiko Inami. J!NS MEME — Activity Recognition using Smart Eyewear. 第17回画像の認識・理解シンポジウム (MIRU2014). July 2014.

  3. 石丸 翔也, Jens Weppner, Kai Kunze, Paul Lukowicz, Andreas Dengel, Andreas Bulling and 黄瀬 浩一. Google Glassを用いた瞬き検出と認知的行動の認識. 第17回画像の認識・理解シンポジウム (MIRU2014). July 2014.
